DOC.detailed_description: PCOS hormonal disease include hyperandrogenism , oligo-or anovulation and/or polycystic ovary ultrasound . PCOS woman often suffer insulin resistance even diabetes risk well full blow metabolic disease . These woman often suffer infertility due lack regular ovulation . Metformin well know anti-diabetic drug , PCOS woman metformin might decrease hyperandrogenism , improve insulin resistance give regular ovulation . Thereby increase chance pregnancy . Our hypothesis metformin increase clinical pregnancy rate spontaneously follow IVF/ICSI .
